entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
